{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2984729,"name":"Ice1605","username":"Ice1605","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/958977/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-03T02:39:55.508Z","cooked":"

All of the code that team 4488 has developed over the past couple of years is now available on GitHub here: https://github.com/shockwave4488/FRC-2020-Public

This repository includes the code used on our 2020 competition robot, Blackout, as well as our 2021 offseason experiments with swerve and the WPILib command-based framework.

Highlights include:

  • Custom command-based framework (2020)
  • Continued development of our 2018-2019 autonomous pathing system that was based on Team 254’s 2017 APP code (2020)
  • Autonomous power cell indexing and management (2020)
  • Extension of the WPILib command-based framework and our previous configuration subsystem to support running different robots from the same code base (2021)

Please let us know if you have any questions!
